text: Joann Weiner is an associate professor of economics at George Washington University in the Columbian College of Arts and Sciences.https://economics.columbian.gwu.edu/joann-weiner ==Education== Weiner earned a Bachelor of Science from the University of California, Berkeley. Weiner earned an M.A. and Ph.D. from Harvard University.https://economics.columbian.gwu.edu/joann-weiner ==Work== Joann Weiner frequently has articles published in the Washington Post.https://www.washingtonpost.com/people/joann-weiner/ She has also written for Bloomberg Government.https://economics.columbian.gwu.edu/joann-weiner ==References== Category:George Washington University faculty Category:Living people Category:Harvard University alumni Category:University of California, Berkeley alumni Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Joann Weiner
